title: Police shut down R350m crystal meth lab, arrest five suspects from 'North American' country
summary: Mpumalanga police shut down a crystal methamphetamine laboratory worth R350m and arrested five foreigners on a farm in Volksrust on Friday.

title: Congregants robbed during evening church service
summary: Two armed robbers disrupted a prayer service at Zayoni Kingdom Catholic Church in Waterloo, north of Durban, on Friday and held up about 60 congregants.

title: Norris sets the pace in final Azerbaijan Grand Prix practice
summary: McLaren's Formula One title contender Lando Norris bounced back from his Friday crash to lap fastest in final practice for the Azerbaijan Grand Prix on Saturday.

title: In sickness and health and crossing the PhD line together
summary: For better or worse, through long nights and the highs and lows of research, married couple Ramesh and Kavita Behara crossed the PhD finish line together.

title: Policeman's PhD quest for justice for women for disabilities inspired by mom's journey
summary: On the beat as a policeman Const Lindokuhle Ngcobo has seen injustice on the streets.
